{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Belkin |model=F9K1102 |revision=v2 |asin= |fcc_date=07/02/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=K7SF9K1102V2 |ic_id=3623A-F9K1102V2 |pcb_id=AD210A-1.6 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197D |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EM2I-12G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AB160TSD-5G |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192DR |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|N600 DB Wireless Dual-Band N+ Router}} :[http://www.belkin.com/us/support-product?rnId=6943 Support page] "AD210A-1.6" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This is the same board ID as the [[Belkin F9K1105 v2]]. {{See also|Beeline SmartBox One|SerComm}} The Flash chip appears to be a MX25L6406EM2I-12G, :but this could be incorrect. __NOTOC__ ===Serial=== :Serial speed: 38400 (8N1) 
 < J22
1 - GND
2 - Tx
3 - Vcc
4 - Rx<
(38400,8,N,1)
